thread.section_title: Prestige Flowers Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.prestigeflowers.co.uk | 70 of 1012
thread.title: Ben

author: Ben
title: Ben
text:
Only just placed the order and was prompted to write a review... so I can't comment on the delivery service or quality of the product(s) yet. Once the order has arrived I'll update this review - taking into account the entire experience.
Initial impressions of the website design/layout is that it appears quite dated and could be improved by implementing some modern flat design principles and being a little less 'busy' - I'd like to see a simple, more image-focused design for website which sells products where their appeal are mainly visual.
Having said that, I was able to find what I was looking for quickly and easily and the ordering/checkout process was relatively smooth... also the prices seem to be the most competitive I could find.
All-in-all the experience so far has been a good one, but the big test will be a) Can they deliver on time? and b) are they decent products?
